title: The 21st century trolley problem
description:
Autonomous tech could lead to deaths at the hands of robots. But is continuing to let humans drive even worse? Recode’s Rani Molla explains.
This episode was made by: 


Producer: Taylor Maycan 


Engineer: Paul Robert Mounsey 


Host: Adam Clark Estes
